article.author: Conservative Byte
article.mainText: You can believe this or not it is completely up to you. The polls are skewered and the betting odds seem to be fixed on Hillary Clinton. Are we fighting another losing battle in getting a republican back in the White House? Here’s what Fox News’ John Stossel had to say. FBN’s John Stossel goes “On the Record” to size up Hillary Clinton versus Donald Trump and gives the currents odds in Vegas.Watch the clip above and sound off below! As seen first on Fox News: Who Do the Odds Favor in November? Stossel Reveals Which Candidate Most People Are Betting On
article.title: The Bets Are In for Who Will Win in November [Video]
